title: The day I versed a Riot Employee

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Yarr, ya put up a good fight, but I think I had the most fun ^-^ I challenge you to a rematch! xD

replies.body:
wow, you played with a rioter,
amazing.
spectacular.
never been done before.

Free Steam games: http://getsteamgift.org 196532 people already got their gift cards!

oh yeah free lies. dig in.


You seem like a person who would.

(asshat)

where are you even getting this crap from. I just said people have played with riot before and you become a toxic little turd, people like you should have your account taken right here right now.

just for reference, you need to note the sarcasm in someway, sarcasm isnt just there.
I'm just like any other player :)
